Wanderwort

𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 canna “cane, reed”, κάννα “reed”, Akkadian 𒄀 (qanû, “reed”, Sumerian 𒄀𒈾 (gi.na)
𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 canna “cane, plant” 𒌑 šammu ⇔ 𒉌 šaman oil ⇔ Soma haoma oil
𓎛 𓈖 𓆰 cannabis κάνναβος 𒋆𒄣𒌦𒈾𒁍 qunnapu ܩܢܦܐ qnpʾ قِنَّب qinnab կանեփ kanepʿ kenevir

汉麻 hanma hemp of the hans
胡麻 huma hemp of foreigners
火麻 huoma hemp of fire (real standing expression)

𒄀𒆸 cannabis 𒇥 bu4 botany ≈ 𒆸 𓊪 phyto 𒌑𒀀𒇥𒋙 “plant” 𒄀 cane reed

𓇬 𓈖 𓃀 𓆰 „cannabis“ flower 𓃀 𓆰 Blume
𓃹 𓈖 𓃀 𓆰 „cannabis“ flower ⇔ Hassassin legend
花匕 huanbi flower

קנה בשם qeneh boshem : aromatic reed

𒃶 qan “cane” in 𒃶𒊭𒆷𒇻 qan ša-la-lu a reed 𓇑 𓇓 𓇔 𓇗 𓇖

𒃶𒁾𒉿 qan ṭup-pi cane-tip “pen” 钢笔 gāngbǐ

𓈖 𓃀 𓆰 bang/bhańga/mang 麻 ma mariuana

𓋴𓂋𓅓𓏏𓈓 sirambit > s-r-p > sirup
𓋴𓂋𓅓𓏏𓈓 სვამს svɑms drink •swarmed 𓊃𓅨𓂋𓏊 swear
𓋴𓂋𓅓𓏏𓈓 sermat > soma/med/mead 疏麻 Shuma
大麻 dama(Ba) ⇔ dampen dämmen

𓃹 𓃀 𓆰 ⇔ sap Sieb Sirup

𓈖 𓃀 𓆰 nebtar nectar

𓎛 𓈖 𓆰 hong 红 🌹 huang 黄 麻 （ephedra) Hanf hemp

𓇬 𓈖 𓃀 | flower | ⇔ cannabis

The ancient readings of the letters in 𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 dictate a form similar to trauma/dreaming.
The m/n component is now unfamiliar in words such as thread or cord, only in the much corroded form hemp/Hanf. And of cause the root 𓎛 turn

𓈎 𓈖 | mat | κάνης kánēs √cane

𒄩𒈾𒁍 ḫa-na-bu flourish, to sprout •con.phyt
